description: A trail shoe with more than one trick up it's sleeve. Versatile, high on traction and comfort, the Alphacross 4 Gore-Tex has a waterproof upper designed for the elements and deep, aggressive lugs to get a grip on a varitey of terrians. A softer midsole compound, more generous fit and soft lining dial in the comofrt on this all-round trainer.
name: Salomon Alphacross 4 GTX - Mens
